body: Imagine your agency optimized and operating better, faster, leaner and outpacing threats with proven expertise—that's the ValorForge promise. Aligned with America's AI Action Plan, we drive U.S. leadership as a veteran-owned SDVOSB in Rockwall, Texas. We offer IT and general consulting, AI implementation, and staffing for DoD and VA, led by an executive leadership team seasoned in the big-four communication, media, and telecom industries with deep IT Consulting experience. We help you think 10X - deliver faster cycles, improve quality, boost Capex and open efficiency, and create alpha—securing missions while empowering veterans and rural growth. Let's build a stronger America together.
